name: PowerPoint osu!
description:
I challenged myself to try and recreate Osu, a seemingly simple game, using Microsoft PowerPoint. 

There is currently only one song, which is not very long. I encourage you to try and make your own songs/beatmaps for this game/presentation.

Inspired by this Icoso video.

MUSIC

Sneaky Snitch by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4384-sneaky-snitch

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

CONTROLS

Use your mouse to click the circles at the correct time in relation to the music.
